raw_body: COGGINS,​ ELMO C.B. – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. (09th February 1935 – 29th November 2023). Dearly beloved husband of late Monica Alice Coggins (nee Samarasinghe),​ loving father of Perry and Dino,​ father-in-law of Stephannie,​ grandfather of Nikita,​ Joanna & Ella. Remains lie at residence No. 42,​ Quarry Road (Galwala Para),​ Mirihana,​ Nugegoda. Cortege leaves residence at 12.15 p.m. on Friday,​ 1st of December 2023 for Service at St. Thomas’ Church Kotte and therafter for Cremation (3.00 p.m.) at the General Cemetery (Kanatte) Borella.078243
